result.execSummary:
The defendant TRISTAN K. SCHOONOVER was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. TRISTAN K. SCHOONOVER is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • TRISTAN K. SCHOONOVER was found guilty of Battery. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
FINE PAID IN FULL.
Forfeiture and costs to be paid within 60 days from sentence date, unless payment plan is approved.  Penalty for non-payment shall be entry of civil judgment.   Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees.  Send payments to:  Clerk of Courts, Room 110, 415 Jackson Street, P O Box 2808, Oshkosh WI  54903-2808.
